Eugene.Performing Frogs:
Performing Frogs is a 1982 sculpture by David Gilhooly, located in Eugene, Oregon, in the United States.


== Description ==
David Gilhooly's Performing Frogs (1982) is a ceramic sculpture depicting frogs performing acrobatics atop six concrete pillars; some of them have birds sitting on their heads. It is installed at the Hult Center for the Performing Arts.
